analysis.description:
BAL.startDate (/unique_contracts/0xf47c61a2d0ed6067110bdf9d0541682dfed0148d.sol#102-103) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- fallback (/unique_contracts/0xf47c61a2d0ed6067110bdf9d0541682dfed0148d.sol#213-225)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_contracts/0xf47c61a2d0ed6067110bdf9d0541682dfed0148d.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_contracts/0xf47c61a2d0ed6067110bdf9d0541682dfed0148d.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_contracts/0xf47c61a2d0ed6067110bdf9d0541682dfed0148d.sol#80) is not in mixedCase
